languages.text: Торбальд Железношкурый еще десятилетия водил Грозовых укусов по Простору, истребляя зло и умножая славные висы в саге своей стаи. Когда он пал, его преемник, Хальбрандт, порешил, что Волкам пора возвращаться домой, и увел стаю в Зев. Было ли успешно их возвращение на Фенрис — неведомо.

Thorbald Ironhide led the Stormbiters for decades more, exterminating evil in the Expanse and adding glorious verses to the saga of his pack. When he fell, his successor, Halbrandt, decided it was time for the Wolves to return home, and so he led the pack into the Maw. Whether they were successful in returning to Fenris is unknown.
languages.original_text: Торбальд Железношкурый еще десятилетия водил Грозовых укусов по Простору, истребляя зло и умножая славные висы в саге своей стаи. Когда он пал, его преемник, Хальбрандт, порешил, что Волкам пора возвращаться домой, и увел стаю в Зев. Было ли успешно их возвращение на Фенрис — неведомо.

traits.locale_text: Thorbald Ironhide led Stormbiters around the Expanse for decades to come, exterminating evil and adding glorious visur to the saga of his pack. After he fell, his successor, Halbrandt, decided that the Wolves needed to return home and led the pack into the Maw. Whether they were successful in returning to Fenris is unknown.

After he fell, his successor, Halbrandt, decided that the Wolves needed to return home and led the pack into the Maw. Whether they were successful in returning to Fenris is unknown.

When he fell, his successor, Halbrandt, decided it was time for the Wolves to return home, and so he led the pack into the Maw. Whether they were successful in returning to Fenris is unknown.

Thorbald Ironhide led the Stormbiters for decades more, exterminating evil in the Expanse and adding glorious verses to the saga of his pack. When he fell, his successor, Halbrandt, decided it was time for the Wolves to return home, and so he led the pack into the Maw. Whether they were successful in returning to Fenris is unknown.

languages.text: 索巴德·铁皮继续领导噬风者狼群数十年，不断消灭科罗努斯扩区中的邪恶，为狼群的史诗增添了无数光彩。当他倒下时，他的继任者哈尔布兰特认为狼群是时候回家了。于是，他带领狼群进入了巨口。至于他们是否成功返回芬里斯，人们不得而知。
languages.original_text: Thorbald Ironhide led the Stormbiters for decades more, exterminating evil in the Expanse and adding glorious verses to the saga of his pack. When he fell, his successor, Halbrandt, decided it was time for the Wolves to return home, and so he led the pack into the Maw. Whether they were successful in returning to Fenris is unknown.

traits.locale_text: 索巴德·铁皮领导了噬风者数十年，不断消灭科罗努斯扩区中的邪恶，为狼群的史诗增添了无数光彩。当他倒下时，他的继任者哈尔布兰特认为狼群是时候回家了。于是，他带领狼群进入了巨口。至于他们是否成功返回芬里斯，人们不得而知。

languages.text: Thorbald Eisenhaut führte die Stormbiters über Jahrzehnte hinweg an. Er löschte in der Ausdehnung das Böse aus und erweiterte die Saga seines Rudels um glorreiches Verse. Als er fiel, entschied sein Nachfolger Halbrandt, dass es für die Wolves Zeit war, nach Hause zurückzukehren. Er führte das Rudel in den Schlund. Ob es ihnen gelungen ist, nach Fenris zu gelangen, ist nicht bekannt.
languages.original_text: Thorbald Ironhide led the Stormbiters for decades more, exterminating evil in the Expanse and adding glorious verses to the saga of his pack. When he fell, his successor, Halbrandt, decided it was time for the Wolves to return home, and so he led the pack into the Maw. Whether they were successful in returning to Fenris is unknown.

traits.locale_text: Thorbald Eisenhaut führte die Stormbiters über Jahrzehnte hinweg an. Er löschte in der Ausdehnung das Böse aus und erweiterte die Saga seines Rudels um glorreiches Visur. Als er fiel entschied sein Nachfolger Halbrandt, dass es für die Wolves Zeit war, nach Hause zurückzukehren. Er führte das Rudel in den Schlund. Ob es ihnen gelungen ist, nach Fenris zu gelangen, ist nicht bekannt.

languages.text: Thorbald Peau-de-Fer resta à la tête des Crocs de la tempête pendant plusieurs décennies, exterminant le mal à travers les Étendues et composant de glorieux vers en hommage aux aventures de sa meute. Lorsqu'enfin il tomba, son successeur, Halbrandt, décida qu'il était temps pour les Loups de rentrer chez eux et mena la meute jusque dans la Gueule. Nul ne sait s'ils réussirent à retourner sur Fenris.
languages.original_text: Thorbald Ironhide led the Stormbiters for decades more, exterminating evil in the Expanse and adding glorious verses to the saga of his pack. When he fell, his successor, Halbrandt, decided it was time for the Wolves to return home, and so he led the pack into the Maw. Whether they were successful in returning to Fenris is unknown.

traits.locale_text: Thorbald Peau-de-Fer resta à la tête des Crocs de la tempête pendant plusieurs décennies, exterminant le mal à travers les Étendues et composant de glorieux vísur en hommage aux aventures de sa meute. Lorsqu'enfin il tomba, son successeur, Halbrandt, décida qu'il était temps pour les Loups de rentrer chez eux et mena la meute jusque dans la Gueule. Nul ne sait s'ils réussirent à retourner sur Fenris.

languages.text: Thorbald Piel de Hierro aún lideró a los Muerdetormentas durante décadas, exterminando el mal en la Extensión y añadiendo más versos gloriosos a la saga de su jauría. Cuando cayó, su sucesor, Halbrandt, decidió que era hora de que los Lobos volvieran a casa y llevó a la jauría hasta las Fauces. Se desconoce si lograron volver a Fenris.
languages.original_text: Thorbald Ironhide led the Stormbiters for decades more, exterminating evil in the Expanse and adding glorious verses to the saga of his pack. When he fell, his successor, Halbrandt, decided it was time for the Wolves to return home, and so he led the pack into the Maw. Whether they were successful in returning to Fenris is unknown.

traits.locale_text: Thorbald Piel de Hierro lideró a los Muerdetormentas durante décadas, exterminando el mal en la Extensión y añadiendo más gloria a la saga de su jauría. Cuando cayó, su sucesor, Halbrandt, decidió que era hora de que los Lobos volvieran a casa y llevó a la jauría hasta las Fauces. Se desconoce si lograron volver a Fenris.

languages.text: トールバルド・アイアンハイドは数十年にわたって嵐喰いの者たちを率い、エクスパンスで悪を退治し、群れの武勇伝に輝かしい詩を刻んだ。彼が倒れたとき、後継者のハルブラントは狼たちが故郷に帰る時が来たと判断し、群れを率いてマウに向かった。彼らがフェンリスへの帰還に成功したかどうかは不明である。
languages.original_text: Thorbald Ironhide led the Stormbiters for decades more, exterminating evil in the Expanse and adding glorious verses to the saga of his pack. When he fell, his successor, Halbrandt, decided it was time for the Wolves to return home, and so he led the pack into the Maw. Whether they were successful in returning to Fenris is unknown.

traits.locale_text: トールバルド・アイアンハイドは数十年にわたって嵐喰いの者たちを率い、エクスパンスで悪を退治し、群れの武勇伝に輝かしい詩を刻んだ。彼が倒れたとき、後継者のハルブラントは狼たちが故郷に帰る時が来たと判断し、群れを率いてマウに向かった。彼らがフェンリスへの帰還に成功したかどうかは不明である。

languages.text: Thorbald Demirpost, Borayutanlar'ı on yıllar boyunca yönetti, Enginlik'teki kötülükleri bertaraf edip sürüsünün görkemli efsanelerine yenilerini ekledi. Öldükten sonra vârisi Halbrandt, Kurtların eve dönme zamanının geldiğine karar verdi ve sürüyü Ağız'a götürdü. Fenris'e başarıyla dönüp dönemedikleri bilinmiyor.
languages.original_text: Thorbald Ironhide led the Stormbiters for decades more, exterminating evil in the Expanse and adding glorious verses to the saga of his pack. When he fell, his successor, Halbrandt, decided it was time for the Wolves to return home, and so he led the pack into the Maw. Whether they were successful in returning to Fenris is unknown.

traits.locale_text: Thorbald Demirpost, Borayutanları on yıllar boyunca yönetti, Enginlik'teki kötülükleri bertaraf etti ve sürüsünün görkemli efsanelerine yenilerini ekledi. Öldükten sonra vârisi Halbrandt, Kurtların eve dönme zamanının geldiğine karar verdi ve sürüyü Ağız'a götürdü. Fenris'e başarıyla dönüp dönemedikleri bilinmiyor.
